Title: Relates to the "middle class STAR" rebate program
Summary: Relates to the "middle class STAR" rebate program; creates the middle class circuit breaker tax credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to the "Middle Class STAR" rebate program; to amend the tax law, in relation to creating the middle class circuit breaker tax credit; to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an enhanced personal income tax credit in such city; and to amend the education law, in relation to establishing limitations upon school district tax levies
